text: Is there a hubl variable to determine if a user is currently logged in? For example, if I'm logged into HubSpot, I want to see a certain section of text, but if its just a general user clicking around the site, i don't want them to see it
i looked through the developer info and didn't see a logged in username or anything like that

If you are on a page, you can click the sprocket menu, then do developer info. From there you can see all the available items.  I believe you want to be looking at `{{ contact.email }}` or something else like `{{ hs_is_contact }}` I'm not sure if that is the proper hubl for those, but they are something like that and can be figured out that way.
By logged in, do you mean with Membership?
If so, you can use `request_<http://contact.is|contact.is>_logged_in` . See <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/features/memberships>
